init.notes: Called when component is inserted into DOM. Parent connectedCallback fires before child.

render.notes: Called after every render. Use isRendered flag to run logic only once.

afterRender.notes: Maps to renderedCallback - use flag for first-render-only logic

rerender.notes: LWC automatically re-renders when reactive properties change

unrender.notes: Clean up event listeners, intervals, and subscriptions

destroy.notes: Use for cleanup: remove event listeners, clear intervals

pageLoad.notes: Page load logic moves to connectedCallback

action.notes: Page action attribute logic moves to connectedCallback

constructor.notes: Don't access this.template or child elements. Initialize state only.

connectedCallback.notes: Can access public properties. this.template may not be ready. Fire initial data loads.

renderedCallback.notes: Safe to access this.template.querySelector. Use flags to prevent infinite loops.

disconnectedCallback.notes: Clean up listeners, intervals, and external subscriptions.

errorCallback.notes: Catches errors from lifecycle hooks of descendants. Log or display error.

firstRenderOnly.description: Run logic only on first render

cleanupPattern.description: Properly clean up intervals and listeners
